body:
## Introduction

This tutorial will take you through the steps required to upload an annotate an existing transcriptome assembly using AfterParty. We will assume that you have been given a user account on a live AfterParty instance. For the purposes of the tutorial, we will be using a small assembly of 1000 reads from the transcriptome of a nematode, _L. sigmodontis_, which can be downloaded [https://raw.github.com/mojones/AfterParty2/master/sample_data/smallAssembly_out.ace](here).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: New user tutorial - creating a dataset from an existing assembly
name: AfterParty
